issue.title: [C++] Arrow dynamic libraries are missed on run of unit tests on Windows
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-699](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-699). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Output DLL and PDB files are not copied to root build output directory.
Because of above DLLs are not found by dependencies loader and unit tests are failed to start.
